Robot Test Cases for Operating System Test Library

Setting Value Value value Value
Library OperatingSystem
Test Setup Remove Temps
Suite Teardown Remove Temps
Variable Value Value Value Value
${TESTFILE} ${CURDIR}${/}robot_temp_file.txt
${TESTDIR} ${CURDIR}${/}robot_temp_dir
Test Case Action Argument Argument Argument Argument Arg
List Dir [ Document ] This test also tests setting variables
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
${files} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless  ${files} == ['bar.txt','foo.txt']
@{files2} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless Equal @{files2}[0] bar.txt
Fail Unless Equal @{files2}[1] foo.txt
${file} @{files3} List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless Equal ${file} bar.txt
Fail Unless Equal @{files3}[0] foo.txt
Remove File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
${files4} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless ${files4} == ['foo.txt']
@{files5} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless Equal @{files5}[0] foo.txt
${file2} @{files6} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless Equal ${file2} foo.txt
Fail Unless @{files6} == []
Remove File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
${files7} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless ${files7} == []
@{files8} = List Dir ${TESTDIR}
Fail Unless @{files8} == []
List Dir With Patterns # 0) Setup
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}${/}foodir
# 1)  Simple pattern
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} *.txt
Fail Unless ${names} == ['bar.txt', 'foo.txt']
Fail Unless len(${names}) == 2
${name_count} Evaluate len(${names})
Ints Equal ${name_count} 2
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} ???.txt simple pattern
Fail Unless ${names} == ['bar.txt', 'foo.txt']
# 2) Regexp pattern
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} o+ this is regexp
Fail Unless ${names} == ['foo.txt', 'foodir']
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} (?i)FO{2} regular expression
Fail Unless ${names} == ['foo.txt', 'foodir']
# 3) Literal string pattern
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} foo literal string
Fail Unless ${names} == ['foo.txt', 'foodir']
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} oodi \
Fail Unless ${names} == ['foodir']
List Dir With Absolute [Document] This tests also List Files In Dir  And List Dirs In Dir
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}${/}foodir
${names} List Dir ${TESTDIR} absolute
Log ${names}
Equals ${names[0]} ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
Equals ${names[1]} ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
Equals ${names[2]} ${TESTDIR}${/}foodir
${names} List Files In Dir ${TESTDIR} absolute
Equals ${names[0]} ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
Equals ${names[1]} ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
${names} List Dirs In Dir ${TESTDIR} absolute
Equals ${names[0]} ${TESTDIR}${/}foodir
List And Count Files And Dirs In Dir [ Document ] Tests 'List Files In Dir', 'List Dirs In Dir', 'Count Files In Dir', 'Count Dirs In Dir' and 'Count Items In Dir'
# 0) Setup
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}foo.txt
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}bar.txt
Create File ${TESTDIR}${/}zap.txt
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}${/}foodir
Create Dir ${TESTDIR}${/}bardir
# 1) List Files In Dir
${files} List Files In Dir ${TESTDIR}
${bar_files} List Files In Dir ${TESTDIR} bar*
Fail Unless ${files} == ['bar.txt','foo.txt','zap.txt']
Fail Unless ${bar_files} == ['bar.txt']
# 2) List Dirs In Dir
${dirs} List Dirs In Dir ${TESTDIR}
${foo_dirs} List Dirs In Dir ${TESTDIR} o+ regexp
Fail Unless ${dirs} == ['bardir', 'foodir']
Fail Unless ${foo_dirs} == ['foodir']
# 3) Count Files In Dir
${file_count} Count Files In Dir ${TESTDIR}
${txt_file_count} Count Files In Dir ${TESTDIR} *.txt
Ints Equal ${file_count} 3
Equals ${file_count} ${txt_file_count}
# 4) Count Dirs In Dir
${dir_count} Count Dirs In Dir ${TESTDIR}
${dir_dir_count} Count Dirs In Dir ${TESTDIR} dir literal
Ints Equal ${dir_count} 2
Equals ${dir_count} ${dir_dir_count}
# 5) Count Items In Dir
${count} Count Items In Dir ${TESTDIR}
${foo_count} Count Items In Dir ${TESTDIR} foo*
Ints Equal ${count} 5
Ints Equal ${foo_count} 2
# 6) Misc tests
${html_file_count} Count Files In Dir ${CURDIR} *.html
${html_dir_count} Count Dirs In Dir ${CURDIR} *.html
${html_item_count} Count Items In Dir ${CURDIR} *.html
Fail Unless ${html_file_count} > 0
Fail Unless Ints Equal ${html_dir_count} 0
Fail Unless Equal ${html_file_count} ${html_item_count}
Keyword Action Argument Argument Argument
Remove Temps Remove File ${TESTFILE}
Remove Dir ${TESTDIR} recursive
